tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Stock (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    date_added DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RiskMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT NOT NULL,
    sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    beta DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    std_dev DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT NOT NULL,
    return_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    risk_free_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    variance DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);
